about_the_game:
Dungeon Minesweeper Chronicles is a thrilling fusion of classic Minesweeper mechanics with turn-based roguelike deckbuilding gameplay.

Explore procedurally generated grids filled with hidden dangers and treasures. Strategically uncover tiles while building a powerful deck of cards that grants you unique abilities to outsmart your enemies.

Every decision matters—triggering a mine could spell disaster, but skillful play and clever card combinations can turn the tide in your favor.

Key Features:

  • Innovative Gameplay: Combine the tactical challenge of Minesweeper with the strategic depth of deckbuilding.

  • Roguelike Elements: Face procedurally generated levels where every run feels fresh and unpredictable.

  • Dynamic Combat: Engage in intense turn-based battles against challenging foes as you uncover the grid.

  • Customizable Playstyle: Build your deck with a variety of powerful cards to suit your strategy.

  • High Replay Value: Experiment with different combinations and paths to discover new strategies and secrets.
